title: A shadow faintly scurries along the room.
description: You notice a subtle change in temperature near the edge of the room. Morvain...
his frame so slender you nearly missed him. His eyes glance toward you, in awe of your arrival.
You ponder when he last had some blood.
He kneels, awaiting your request for his service.

outcomeText: Morvain's eyes glimmer with glee... too human for your liking
He quickly scurries toward the exit, repeatedly bowing every couple of steps.

preventEvents.title: You hear heavy footsteps approaching you...

outcomeText: His gaze drops to the ground, and he sulks on his way out.
